message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to us, we're confident it will be a great asset for you as well. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a price of $9,500 for this transaction.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $8,800 for the product.
Thank you for your proposal, Bob. I understand your situation and am willing to consider your offer. After some internal deliberation, I am now able to offer the product to you at $9,000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the effort, I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose a final price of $8,500 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing the situation again, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $8,750 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I am committed to staying within my budget. I would like to propose a final price of $8,600 for the product.
Considering your commitment to your budget, Bob, I am willing to sell the product to you at $8,700. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. However, I am unable to move past $8,600 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that respects my budget.
I understand your position, Bob. In light of this, I am willing to sell the product to you for $8,650. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I am prepared to pay $8,600 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that respects both our positions.
